wahooo i think i like this answer 4 the cat thing lol,anyways wow alot has gone on with everyone.im out o the house got kicked out by a judje because im unsafe to be around my lil bro....long story just call me.umm single again and lovin it and every one else lol not really that would be bad but i have been called play boy alot lateley and whore too but thats enough o that.court should be over hear in like 3 months and i got a puppy.ok yeah good talking to u all and im goin 4 a drive.

i put my brothers dad in a wheel chair......on the night o my birthday he decide he was going to beat his wife and my brother.i got a call from his wife and went over.the cops took hiom away and i took robert home.last night he got out o jail and went home...i went over ther and beat the living hell out o him.47 times with a base ball bat normaly works...i how he never walks again.the lesson to be learned.dont abuse women or my lil brother,and if you do i better not find out.......i think i might start playing baswe ball again i forgot how good o a swing i have hahahahaahahahahahah

I made a Quiz for you! Take my Quiz! and then Check out the Scoreboard! ok those quizes were prety cool even thou i failed horibly hahahaha.ok alls good with me.im single again and lovin it hahahha.pretty sad,i wouldnt have sex with an underaged minor and she got mad so i threw her out like yesterdays road apples.so back to bing the old single tony.hahahaha whoopie 4 me

i got a tatoo.it's cool.yup.cant wait to see my gf.cant wait till she turns 18.she hates havin to wait to do it.lol hahaha,i think its funnier than hell but yeah i cant wait either.i miss all my friends though.they are all moved away in school or in the services.i must admit though with all this atention from other gals it's hard to stay true.but love is stronger land my......well u no.it's ok head an hand jobs have to do 4 now lol hahahahahahaha.i know you all just wanted to no that so bad

ok thought this was funnier than shit sorry.well well i have ahd ani interesting month.i have a question....IS THERE ONE FRICKIN GAL IN THIS TOWN WHO DOSENT WANT ME IN BED THEESE DAYS!!!!!!!!!GESE....sorry but i swear i get a girlfiend and all of a sudden i turn into a sex icon for the women of SANTA CLARA FRICKEN COUNTY!!!!!!!!! all right i admit that my nick name from my girlfriend is now "OH MY GOD" but i meen how was i supposed to no she liked.......well ill just leave it at that.ok ive been doin a lil catchin up on my gals and heres what i have to say.....gretchen leave your hair the way it is.im sure im too late to stop the massacre of your head but oh well that my 2 cents on that. you do have a chance to get into whatever fancy smany school ya want to get into,no worries mate. liz remember when i was over visitin you guys and told you after the accident that i hated god or him or whatever that big thin is that we dont know about. babe you feel whatever you want its ok shit if ya dont want to hate him hate me lol ya never no it might work.alright love you all so much and cant wait to hear from ya'll. P.S cant wait for tyhe weddin and lookin 2 the ring. one question thou? do i have to wear a dress,cause that could be a problem with my legs and all.i love you gals but there is no way in the underworld you are geting me to TRY and shave those damn things.
i love the world and everyone in it.guess what i got a girlfriend..................yeah for real too lol hahahahahahahahahaahahahahahahahaha.im so happy in case u cant tell.ok love all ttyl

hands reaching out,
thousands upon thousands encircling me.
fear confusion engulfing my body
what to do, which to grab,which not to.
hands of flesh,hands of bone.
hands decorated in jewels,
hands decorated in scars.
feeling my skin, tearing it
healing it,worshiping it.
pain and love
sorrow and joy.
eyes closed i reach out
my fingers enclosing over warmth.
pulsing with hate,with love
gloving with the fire of lust.
i pull twards me as the hands recede,
back to the darkness,the unknown.
a face apears and a smile is shown.
our lips touch for but a second,
our souls aflame with desire.
then you burst into flames.
screams so loud they shattger glass.
the tears come as you reach out to me.
i reach back as you turn to ash.
out of the darkness the hands return,
more now with death and pain.
the wind picks up to blow away another pile of ash.
the words "i love you" float on the wind as my tears return.
again i must choose which hands to hold,
wich soul to burn.
back again to a false love.
back again to reality.

well long time no see pete.im doin pretty good latley.i quit smokin a long time ago and havent had one since and i quit drinkin by myself and only do it rarley with friends(like never).well ive been talkin to this gal for a while and i just think we might hit it off,boy i sher hope so cause she is an awsome gal.a lil younger than me lik by a year but nothin to drastic.just got to wait for her to come of age lol,but thats not what it's bout anyways just want to have fun,you know me,the nice guy.she is my old boses daughter from when i worked at the vets on tennant.rachel and i are supposed to hang out but i dont know when i have to get the vehicle but mom is being a bugger.lol it seems since the last day i talked or even saw cassi my life has just gotten so much better and un stressful.its a sad thin that it had to happen but it is best for me.i cant have "rocket the fastest fuck in the west"hangin on to me and leachin the fun and life out of me.i still hang with regina and im goin to her dance tommorow.work is goin good and i might get a promotion at the movies but i doubt it,but you never know.the only bad thing right now is im sick lol.ashley<thats the gal i been talkin bout, gave me her cold.lol but thats fine with me lol.ok pete talk to ya'll later i gota finish stackin wood......"hey look guys i got wood"......lol see ya'll later.

p.s love you gals and miss ya all.

well well,i hate wrighting sad journals.but it's hard to write bout somthin good when nothin is happenin.i'm feelin pretty good right now(burp!),oh that felt good.man  im worried bout my gals why is it that i had to open my big stupid mouth and say that i talked to whats his name....oh yeah jeff.i knew what grethcen was thinkin bout him and i still said somthin and now messed up two more peoples lif.FUCK cant i make one person happy anymore.i try and try but it dont work.now liz and gretch(too long to write full name right now sry) were engaged right,but now...NO.not anymore.god damn you tony whjy did you have to open your mouth,just another thing to add on my regrets list.they were so happy and i messed that up for um.ok im tired and i want to right more but the key are all blury and swerling. i miss them all sooooooooooooooooooooo(breath)oooooooooooooooooooooo much it hurts.just cause i felt like i was wanted rund them and the accident wasnt a part of our lives.werr may be i just need to get away from everyone for a whil.i dont hang round with anyoone any more exept me the dog and the bottle.my best friends,lol.they kill me ....well cept the dog he is my buddie.he drunk rightm now hahahaha.ok time for leepy by ninenite i have to get up at 5 am an go to bitch work.see yall later.girls dont make anythin you will regtret. teke it from me,a person who haS NOTHING BUT REGRETS.YOY R BIG GIRLSH THOUGH AND CAN LIVE YOU OWN LIFE.OK I AM CONFUSED I DONT KNOW WHAT IM TALKIN BOU GOOD NITE././......OH YEAH LUV ALL YA

uhhhh.........cowboy stuff is love
brought to you by the isLove Generator
man i thought my mind was messed up pete.these poor gals are goin through hell and a hand basket and i cant help them.this si the first time i ever remember me not having something encouraging to say.i just want them both to be happy.they meen so much to me, both of them belive it or not....haha.well spent the night at alexes house last night and stayed up till 6:30 lol.it's been a long week and cant wait to hang out with rachel some time and for the gals to get down here.its goin to be diffrent now when they come down here cause im not gonna want to get in the way and ill feel wierd.i trust jeff to a piont dont get me wrong he is a great guy but....what about a good life.you cant party forever.he will always be my bud and i know he is always there for me but i just hope he knows what he is doin and gettin into.well off to work see ya'll later

hahahahahha!im in a destructive mood....dont know why.man i just realised today thaT I HAVENT SMOKED SINCE I GOT HOME FROM NH and i havent talked to cassie in like ......WOW.......five whole days. whoho i feel great bout that, she will call and leave a voicve mail but i pretend i didnt get it,hehehehehehehehe.oh yeah MOM LEAVES FOR A WEEK ON THE THIRD OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOHHHHHHHHHHHHH YYYYYYYYYEEEEEEEEEEEEEEAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH. no party but finaly some peace and quiet.ok im goin to bed nite pete

wow today i learned my greatest fear.some people fear sharksor the dark but the thing i fear most is.....erins parents.today the camer into the movies while i was working and i had to check thier tickets.my throat closed up i started to shake and then the tears came.i got sent home early because i couldnt handle that.i'm not used to being afriad and i dont like the feeling.i cant stop thinking about the accident and her parents so im trying to dink away the pain...so far its workin.i wish i was in the navy right now over seas saving marines and gettin shot at.i wish this was all over and i could move away.so by the end of this second bottle of jack daniels(oh yeah baby) i hope i will at least dream of those places or somewhere better.you are most alone when you are afraid.i just realised that.i hope no one ever feels the way i do right now.ever.and on a happy note lizs birthday is in ....lets see....three days.(i tyhink)no tommorrow sorry liz.ill call tommorrow.see ya'll later.

hey pete.todays just one o' those days where it all hits you.im not depressed but im not happy either.well im not goin to jail cause my lawyer got court appointed so got to deal with that longer.my two friends who have been together for 4 years are expecting a little boy in 5 months and that is really cool cause i get to go to the baby shower,i know its a girly thing but it will be fun.it's just with all this good stuff happening i dont have anyone special to share it with.well everyone says i could with cassie but i can't stand her anymore.we have grown really far apart.from friends to lovers to best friends to people who cant stand each other. she is to much of a lil' kid still and i think the accident made me grow up alot more that she has.i cant stand to even hear her name these days cause i know that she is just throwing her life away.i know in time i will find someone but right now it is so hard to be all alone.i have my friends yeah but you cant cuddle with friends,and thats just not the type o' guy i am anyway.truthfully i guess you can say i miss brittney.i saw her at the movies yesterday and did she look good.that brought all those feelings back,it always does.unfortunately with me the problem is that i dont hang around with any one anymore cause well either they dont call or i just dont want to be round them,so it's not like i can meet new people.pluss lol im a cold son o' a bitch now too, not the always smiling happy go lucky tony i used to be.well there are a few gals out ther i can see myself with not many(like 2)but it always just takes time.see ya'll latter.thanks pete.

C:

size="2">You take the Hard Road.
Who doesn't love a challenge? When life gives you lemons you
not only make lemonade, you make lemon meringue pie to go along with it. When
things are at their worst, you are at your best. You thrive in conflict and more
worried when things are going well. To this end you tend to make things harder on
yourself than they have to be. You can become over-confident at times. Be
careful not to bite off more than you can chew or you'll bury yourself. You probably
have trouble accepting the help of other people, needing the satisfaction that
you not only can, but must do everything yourself. This just isn't true, it's
good to be independent and self-reliant as you are, but it takes an even
greater amount of strength to admit when you need help and sometimes even you
need help. You take charge of the bad situations with no problem and people know
that you are the one to get them through it. But when things are going your
way, you aren't sure what to do and tend to just do what others want to , all the
while searching for that hard road again. Things don't always have to be hard,
you don't have to always face the tough days on your own and you can decide
what you want for the good days. Find that strength in humility we know is
there and let someone know when you need help and take that easy road every once in
awhile. Give yourself the break you deserve.



What Path Do You Take In Life? [X]For Guys and Gals! Pics and Lengthy Results.[X]

well pete looks like i got two more days left till another descision.i really want to go back to nh.i miss them all so much.i hate everyone down here and cant wait to get away from them whether i move or go to jail.well juast hope this whole thing works out for the best buddy.alright see ya'll latter.

AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHh!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!get me the hell outa here someone PLEASE.anyways now that i got that out of my system i feel mutch better.no wait thats a lie no i dont,i hate morgan hill.people around here are to loud and dont know when to shut up and the only thing i hear about is drama.oh shit my bopy friend thats been cheating on me for a month and tony already told me but i didnt belive him then just broke up with me because i wasnt FUCKING him enough, thats all i hear damn it.(oh salad yumm)ive got gluer on my ass from work,im tired, and no one around here is even half as interesting or goodlookin as what ive been used to in the past week.but whats a guy whos goin off to jail in TWO fricken days supposed to do.well pete and i are leaving now we'll be gone forever dont leave a message......ok sorry we're back.i guess you can say that i just miss being wanted around not because tony fixes everything but because the whole"i dont know what i would do if you werent here"thing is gone.NO ONE and i meen NO ONE knew i was even gone. i tell them that and they are like"oh really wow i didnt know but HERE IS WHAT MY LIFE IS FRICKEN LIKE!!!!!"ok im not a selfish guy but what the hell about my life.DOES ANYONE WANT TO KNOW, anyone, hello you there,no guess not. oh well ill just go back to the "i have no life so i dont care tell me your problems i will fix them as mine grow bigger" tony.thats the guy everyone likes.i finally had a good time last week with perople who cared and made me feel special and loved again and then WHAMMMM!!! its over,,,,gone,,,, out the window,byebye.WOW that actually did work gretchen was right haha cool.ok guys me and pete got a dinner to goto for regina in an hour so.se ya'll later.

well just to let you know my little emotion buddy or whatever you call it has a name,and his name is.....pete.yeah thats right pete the penguin.pete and i are havin a greta time,WE GOT A YO-YO.....AND IT'S GREEEEEEENNN!!!!!! yeah our favorite color is green and we like nothin more that yo-yo'in.its the gretest thing in the world........well maybe not there are other things better but we wont go there.so anyways the only thing that could bring us dow is if the srting snaps(knock on wood)and we hope it dont.so just wanted to let all you people who pretend to care what im doing and what my emotions name is,see ya'll later from us both.Ya'll come back now ya hear!

ok how would you feel being in a house with three goodlookin galls for a week.WHOA!!!!!!yeeeah it's pretty cool......but unfotunatly i have to leave tommorrow AT 4 am.but hey it was wonderfull to come up and visit.i'm really energetic right now so i am righting for the first time in this thing and im goin NUTSSSSSSSSS.rachel was unfortunate enough to offer to help me find a pic for me(boy was she sorry)and we worked on it for an hour or so.lol.so ....yeah it was fun.well im gonna go now.Ya'll have a good day now,have fun.
